summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 7721, entitled, "An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to contract for the sale of surplus water to the Seattle and lake Washington Waterway Company at a special rate," approved February 6th, 1902, and directing the Board of Public Works to serve notice upon the said Seattle and Lake Washington Waterway Company that no more water will be supplied said company from and after the 13th day of June, 1904.
